SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT Q_NO , M_NAME , Q_TITLE , Q_CONTENT , Q_DATE , Q_STATUS , Q_ANSWER , Q_PWD FROM QUESTION JOIN MEMBER USING(M_NO) WHERE Q_STATUS != 'N'
ORDER BY Q_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
INSERT INTO QUESTION ( Q_NO , M_NO , Q_TITLE , Q_CONTENT , Q_DATE , Q_STATUS , Q_ANSWER , Q_PWD ) VALUES ( SEQ_QUESTION.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , DEFAULT , DEFAULT , DEFAULT , ? )
